entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is mentioned as being laid upon the desk. It is described as a significant object that has been used in the story so far.

entities.name: ruby-encrusted sword
entities.description: The ruby-encrusted sword is mentioned alongside the Sorting Hat and Riddle's diary. It is described as a valuable object.

entities.name: riddle's diary
entities.description: Riddle's diary is mentioned as being laid upon the desk. It is described as something that has been damaged.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who finally realized that Harry was hearing a Basilisk in the pipes.

entities.name: basilisk
entities.description: The Basilisk is mentioned as something that Harry and Ron followed into the Forest. It is described as being responsible for Moaning Myrtle's death.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is mentioned as someone who told Harry and Ron where the last victim of the Basilisk had died.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle is mentioned as being the victim of the Basilisk. It is described that she was killed in her bathroom.

entities.name: chamber of secrets
entities.description: The Chamber of Secrets is mentioned as a location where Harry and Ron are trying to find the entrance.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as someone who prompts Harry to continue telling them about how he found out where the entrance was.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who followed the spiders into the Forest with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is telling everyone about how he found out where the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets was.

relationships.description: Harry heard the Basilisk in the pipes, which Hermione finally realized was what he was hearing.
Aragog told Harry and Ron where the last victim of the Basilisk had died.
Harry guessed that Moaning Myrtle was the victim of the Basilisk.
Harry found out where the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets was.
Ron followed the spiders into the Forest with Harry, which led them to find out more about the Basilisk.
Harry told Professor McGonagall and others about how he found out where the entrance was.
